1128380.name: Block Tuner VERSION POOP
1128380.description:
Breaking blocks is “to stab or to be stabbed”





（＊Depending on your PC System Requirement, the game may slow down. We kindly ask for your understanding.）

■ Genre
Sci-Fi like x Moe x Breaking Blocks Action

■ Welcome to the world of "Block Tuner"！
As you already know, the robots have declared a war against the earth！
Can you make friends with them by breaking blocks？
That’s up to your skill.
A challenging and unique stage for each robot is waiting for you！
Some stages require your hearing and logical thinking skills・・・？

■SYSTEM


・ Vertical movement is also required in this game. Dodge robots’ attacks by jumping!

・ When you have only one Life, you can use "Reload System"！
This system enables you to reset a ball to the condition before launching.
The deadliest situation is the greatest chance！
Reload System can be used both for attack and defense. Can you use it to the fullest！？
1128380.supported_languages:
日语*, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
